rawConfiguration.text:
![MySQL logo](https://www.mysql.com/common/logos/logo-mysql-170x115.png)

## Overview

[MySQL](https://www.mysql.com/) is the world's most popular open source database. Whether you are a fast growing web property, technology ISV or large enterprise, MySQL can cost-effectively help you deliver high performance, scalable database applications.

---

## About this dashboard

* For information on the MySQL on-host integration, please visit the documentation [here](https://docs.newrelic.com/install/mysql/).
* To view the source code, please visit the [nri-mysql repository](https://github.com/newrelic/nri-mysql).
* Use the `Host` and `Node` variables at the top of this page to filter your results.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(entityName) AS `Node` FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((NOT (net.maxUsedConnections IS NULL) AND (hostname IN ({{mysql_host}}))) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET tuple(hostname AS `Hostname`, cluster.nodeType AS `Node Type`, port AS `TCP Port`, software.version AS `MySQL Version`, software.edition AS `MySQL Edition`) LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
## Database Connections

Active connections and connection attempts per second

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(net.threadsConnected) AS `Active Connections` FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX

SELECT max(net.threadsConnected) AS `Max Connections` FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT average(net.connectionsPerSecond) AS `Connections per Second` FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
## Database Operations

`SELECT`, `INSERT`, `UPDATE`, and `DELETE` statements executed per second

## Database Waits

Waits per second due to failed requests for a table lock

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(query.comInsertPerSecond) AS `Insert Commands`, average(query.comSelectPerSecond) AS `Select Commands`, average(query.comUpdatePerSecond) AS `Update Comands`, average(query.comDeletePerSecond) AS `Delete Commands` FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT average(db.tablesLocksWaitedPerSecond) AS `Waits` FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
## Database Queries

Total queries per second (including stored programs), Percentage of queries per second exceeding the `long_query_time` parameter, and Total queries per second, filtered to only clients (Questions)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(query.queriesPerSecond) AS `Queries` FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT ((average(query.slowQueriesPerSecond) / average(query.queriesPerSecond)) * 100) AS `Slow Query Rate` FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT average(query.questionsPerSecond) AS `Questions` FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
## Database Throughput

Network byte throughput (Sent and Received) and [InnoDB](https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.0/en/innodb-introduction.html) tables data Read/Write rates

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(net.bytesReceivedPerSecond) AS `Received`, average(net.bytesSentPerSecond) AS `Sent` FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT average(db.innodb.dataReadBytesPerSecond) AS `Read InnoDB Data`, average(db.innodb.dataWrittenBytesPerSecond) AS `Write InnoDB Data` FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
## Extended Metrics

This page is populated with the [extended metrics](https://docs.newrelic.com/install/mysql/#extended-metrics) collected when enabled in the [integration configuration file](https://github.com/newrelic/nri-mysql/blob/master/mysql-config.yml.sample).

Example:

```yaml
integrations:
- name: nri-mysql
  env:
    EXTENDED_METRICS: true    # Default: false
    ...
```

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.maxExecutionTimeExceededPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
## Temporary Objects

Temp tables and files created per second

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.createdTmpTablesPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: Temporary tables on disk per second

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.createdTmpDiskTablesPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.createdTmpFilesPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
## Open Tables Cache

Hits, Misses, and Overflows per second

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.tableOpenCacheHitsPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.tableOpenCacheMissesPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.tableOpenCacheOverflowsPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
## Thread Cache

Total count and rates for creation and misses

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.threadsCached) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.threadsCreatedPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.threadCacheMissRate) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
## Query Performance

Various metrics that indicate performance pressure that could be optimized by redesigning queries and/or tables
### Number of joins that perform table scans because they do not use indexes, per second.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.selectFullJoinPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text: ### Number of joins per second that used a range search on a reference table.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.selectFullJoinRangePerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text: ### Number of joins per second without keys that check for key usage after each row.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.selectRangeCheckPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text: ### Number of joins per second that used ranges on the first table.

widgets.title: First table range join per second

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.selectRangePerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text: ### Number of merge passes that the sort algorithm has had to do, per second.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.sortMergePassesPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text: ### Number of sorts per second that were done using ranges.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.sortRangePerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text: ### Number of sorted rows per second.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.sortRowsPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text: ### Number of sorts that were done by scanning the table, per second.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.sortScanPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
## Extended InnoDB Metrics

This page is populated with both the default and [extended InnoDB metrics](https://docs.newrelic.com/install/mysql/#extended-innodb-metrics), which are collected when enabled in the [integration configuration file](https://github.com/newrelic/nri-mysql/blob/master/mysql-config.yml.sample).

Example:

```yaml
integrations:
- name: nri-mysql
  env:
    EXTENDED_INNODB_METRICS: true    # Default: false
    ...
```

widgets.title: Buffer pool requests vs Reads from disk (%)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT ((latest(db.innodb.bufferPoolPagesTotal) - latest(db.innodb.bufferPoolPagesFree)) / latest(db.innodb.bufferPoolPagesTotal)) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text: ### InnoDB Table Activity

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.innodb.dataReadBytesPerSecond) AS `Read` FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.innodb.dataWrittenBytesPerSecond) AS `Write` FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text: ### InnoDB Logs and Table Row Locks

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.innodb.logWaitsPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: InnoDB Row Lock Waits per second

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.innodb.rowLockWaitsPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT average(db.innodb.rowLockTimeAvg) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text: ### InnoDB Buffer Pool Pages and Read-Ahead

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.innodb.bufferPoolPagesDirty) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: Buffer pool pages flushed per second

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.innodb.bufferPoolPagesFlushedPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT (max(db.innodb.bufferPoolReadAheadEvictedPerSecond) / max(db.innodb.bufferPoolReadAheadPerSecond)) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: Buffer pool read requests per second

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.innodb.bufferPoolReadRequestsPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.innodb.bufferPoolReadsPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: Buffer pool write requests per second

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.innodb.bufferPoolWriteRequestsPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.innodb.bufferPoolWaitFreePerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text: ### InnoDB `fsync()` Operations, Data, and Redo Log Activity

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.innodb.numOpenFiles) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.innodb.dataFsyncsPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.innodb.dataPendingFsyncs) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.innodb.dataPendingReads) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.innodb.dataPendingWrites) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.innodb.logWriteRequestsPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.innodb.logWritesPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text: ### InnoDB Pages Activity

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.innodb.pagesCreatedPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.innodb.pagesReadPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.innodb.pagesWrittenPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text: ### InnoDB Table Row Activity

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.innodb.rowsDeletedPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.innodb.rowsInsertedPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.innodb.rowsReadPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.innodb.rowsUpdatedPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
## Extended MyISAM Metrics

This page is populated with the [extended MyISAM metrics](https://docs.newrelic.com/install/mysql/#extended-myisam-metrics) collected when enabled in the [integration configuration file](https://github.com/newrelic/nri-mysql/blob/master/mysql-config.yml.sample).

Example:

```yaml
integrations:
- name: nri-mysql
  env:
    EXTENDED_MY_ISAM_METRICS: true    # Default: false
    ...
```

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(db.myisam.keyCacheUtilization) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.myisam.keyBlocksNotFlushed) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.myisam.keyReadRequestsPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.myisam.keyReadsPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.myisam.keyWriteRequestsPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(db.myisam.keyWritesPerSecond) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
## Extended Cluster Metrics

This page is populated with the [extended cluster metrics](https://docs.newrelic.com/install/mysql/#extended-slave-cluster-metrics) collected when `extended metrics` are enabled in the [integration configuration file](https://github.com/newrelic/nri-mysql/blob/master/mysql-config.yml.sample) and the integration has found an active slave node (`mysql.node.cluster.slaveRunning: 1`)

Example:

```yaml
integrations:
- name: nri-mysql
  env:
    EXTENDED_METRICS: true    # Default: false
    ...
```

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(cluster.slaveIORunning) AS `Slave IO Running`, latest(cluster.slaveSQLRunning) AS `Slave SQL Running` FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX
SELECT max(db.relayLogSpace) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(cluster.secondsBehindMaster) FROM MysqlSample WHERE ((hostname IN ({{mysql_host}})) AND (entityName IN ({{mysql_node}}))) FACET concat(hostname, ' - ', entityName) AS `Node` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT uniqueCount(database_name) FROM MysqlSlowQueriesSample FACET database_name WHERE database_name != ''
FROM MysqlSlowQueriesSample SELECT latest(avg_elapsed_time_ms) facet query_text WHERE database_name NOT IN ('','performance_schema')
SELECT count(execution_count) as 'Execution count' FROM MysqlSlowQueriesSample WHERE execution_count IS NOT NULL and database_name != '' TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Average wait time by event names(in ms)

nrqlQueries.query: FROM MysqlWaitEventsSample SELECT latest( total_wait_time_ms) facet wait_event_name WHERE database_name != ''

SELECT latest(database_name),latest(query_text) , latest(execution_count), latest(avg_cpu_time_ms), latest(avg_elapsed_time_ms), latest(avg_disk_reads), latest(avg_disk_writes), latest(has_full_table_scan), latest(statement_type) FROM MysqlSlowQueriesSample FACET query_id WHERE database_name NOT IN ('','performance_schema')
FROM MysqlSlowQueriesSample SELECT  average(avg_disk_writes) as 'Avg disk writes' WHERE database_name != '' FACET database_name TIMESERIES
FROM MysqlSlowQueriesSample SELECT average(avg_disk_reads) as 'Avg disk reads' WHERE database_name != '' FACET database_name TIMESERIES

SELECT 
      latest(blocked_query),
      latest(blocked_host),
      latest(blocked_query_time_ms),
      latest(blocked_txn_start_time),
      latest(blocking_query),
      latest(blocking_host),
      latest(blocking_query_time_ms),
      latest(blocking_txn_start_time),
      latest(database_name)
FROM MysqlBlockingSessionSample facet blocked_txn_id,
      blocked_thread_id,blocking_txn_id,
      blocking_thread_id where blocked_query IS NOT NULL and blocking_query IS NOT NULL limit MAX
SELECT latest(query_id), latest(query_text),latest(rows_examined),latest(rows_sent),latest(execution_time_ms)  FROM MysqlIndividualQueriesSample FACET event_id, thread_id

SELECT latest(query_cost), latest(table_name), latest(access_type), latest(rows_examined_per_scan), latest(rows_produced_per_join), latest(filtered), latest(read_cost), latest(eval_cost), latest(prefix_cost), latest(data_read_per_join),latest(possible_keys), latest(key), latest(key_length), latest(used_key_parts), latest(ref), latest(using_index) from MysqlQueryExecutionSample FACET event_id, thread_id, step_id
SELECT count(wait_event_name) FROM MysqlWaitEventsSample where total_wait_time_ms > 0 and database_name NOT IN ('','null') and query_text NOT IN ('','null') FACET wait_event_name LIMIT max

SELECT latest(total_wait_time_ms) FROM MysqlWaitEventsSample where total_wait_time_ms > 0 and database_name NOT IN ('','null') and query_text NOT IN ('','null') facet wait_event_name, wait_category LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES
SELECT average(total_wait_time_ms) FROM MysqlWaitEventsSample where database_name NOT IN ('','null') and query_text NOT IN ('','null') and total_wait_time_ms > 0 FACET wait_event_name TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Trend of DB instance wait times(in sec)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT latest(total_wait_time_ms / 1000.0) FROM MysqlWaitEventsSample WHERE database_name != '' FACET database_name

SELECT query_id, query_text, wait_event_name, total_wait_time_ms FROM MysqlWaitEventsSample  WHERE query_id != '' and database_name NOT IN ('','null') and query_text NOT IN ('','null') and total_wait_time_ms > 0 limit MAX

nrqlQuery.query:
FROM Metric SELECT uniques(mysql.hostname)
WHERE metricName = 'mysql.node.net.maxUsedConnections'
SINCE 1 WEEK AGO LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT uniques(entity.name)
WHERE metricName = 'mysql.node.net.maxUsedConnections'
SINCE 1 WEEK AGO LIMIT MAX
